Is this supposed to be a joke? Riot adds the new Warlords keystone, effectively giving Yasuo an insanely overpowered additional passive, then makes a red post about how to play him? Are they just trying to rub it in our faces?

No, Riot, stop.
Yasuo is already broken with the new mastery, don't make more people play him please. {{item:3348}} {{item:3070}}
ive seen nothing but yasuo's and kats lately, its too late

Buy Cull --> Get Boots --> Get Shiv --> Boot upgrade pending on match --> Get 100 minion CS + a kill or two --> Sell now no Passive Cull and get Infinity Edge. GO CRAZY!

Its hilarious. Just try it out before you downvote this. Shiv lets you get Cull's 100 minion CS passive easily since it can wave clear and deals +50% damage to minions. Add in Warlord's Bloodlust for crit healing shenanigans.

Amazing Yasuo Outplay Tip:

Get Warlords as your keystone mastery.

Congrats on your win!

hahahahahahaha

1v5 yasuo penta in ranked, i got a 4 man knockup and killed 4 of them, then the fifth person came (who was ahri) and i windwalled her charm and q, she flashed past my ww and i flashed through it so that her w couldnt hit me, then i q'd and killed her (she was low)
Noo! please don't teach anymore Yasou players tips to exploit his Overpoweredness!!
I wear my helmet when I play yas, that way I don't get permanent brain damage from smashing my face against the keyboard.{{item:3151}}

oh you guys do it on purpose
Trash tier bronzies complaining about a champ that isnt even reliable, you don't play yasuo so don't act like you know his strengths and weaknesses, Learn to counter him
Just to earn you some popularity points, why don't you list a few weaknesses for us?

Besides bronzies absolutely sucking at him?

Lets see, 

-he's item dependent, make him fall behind and hes done.
-his ult while a game changer can still screw himself over
-without another team member built around him for teamfights, it can be hard for a yasuo to enter a fight given the enemy champions are aware of him.
-he has counters like every other champ, though not as many, his counters excel at what they do, counter him. While other matches can be skill dependent, I can't see a yasuo beating a jax, given they both know how to play the game.
-"I'm really good at yasuo, see I can dash through minions whilst spamming skills so I can then outplay this 1v5". *Dies*
You forgot the add the part where after Statik Shiv he can just go solo dragon and herald like it's no big deal and get back to lane before his opponent finishes their wave.
And as he said "peace", League finished updating! {{champion:157}}

Great video im a yasuo main and i was already watching red mercy for quite some time now, he was 1 of the reasons I decided to buy Yasuo in the 1st place but as a yasuo main u figure these tricks out pretty fast =d none the less a good video for newer players to him and to those who wish to try and counter play him{{champion:157}} {{champion:238}}

What about the extra AA trick? Where you E+Q in, and instead of instantly ulting, as they're in the air you finish 1 last auto attack animation for extra damage, and right as it looks like they hit the ground, you ult. Not only do you get the extra AA damage, but by delaying the ult you also gain a little bit of extended CC. This has always helped me when playing Yasuo :)
I don't really think Yasuo is that hard of a champion. Sue me. I just feel like his kit counters so many AP mages and ADc's at the same time it's easy pickins.
unless he ults them. I've seen a yasuo get up to 90% armor pen after he ults.
its 50 armor pen, for bonus armor, iits probably not as bad as fiora's true dmg :p
Another thing is, when you e'q knockup try to always fit an auto attack before you go into your ultimate to get off more damage and finish with the q mid ulti.
You can also alternatively, land a tornado, and e q through a minion, during the dash, you can ult giving you a stack on your q while in mid air.
Big thanks to Redmercy for letting us feature his video!
Why the heck would you feature a how to play yasuo video when he's in this absurd state of just....being op

Never tried {{champion:157}}, never will

Happy to know I can bring {{champion:79}} in ranked for every role and game very soon

Anyone who has played this game for more than a year has enough intelligence to know Yasuo takes skill to play. I'm done poking holes in hate posts on this thread. Keep hope anyone who came here to increase their general knowledge of how to play the champ, you are not alone. Good luck on your matches, and hopefully you can grind through the low elos into at least gold by fighting the true skill-less champs such as Zed, Yi, Katarina, Fizz, Viktor, Lux, Darius, Garen, Brand, etc. Keep hope and don't let the "Yasuo nooby champ nurf him" haters get to you. Anyways, time to go play another match.

Nerf Yasuo; the fucking ground, and keep digging - and then rework him - but during the rework keep nerfing him because Yasuo by no means should have been released, he is unhealthy for the game in every way, shape and form, also is never fun to lane against
